# Next.js Project Instructions

## Project Overview
This is a modern Next.js web application built with:
- **Framework**: Next.js 16.1.2 with App Router
- **Language**: TypeScript
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS
- **Linting**: ESLint
- **Package Manager**: npm

## Getting Started

### Development Server
```bash
npm run dev
```
The application will run on [http://localhost:3000](http://localhost:3000)

### Build for Production
```bash
npm run build
npm start
```

### Linting
```bash
npm run lint
```

## Project Structure
- `src/app/` - App Router pages and components
- `src/components/` - Reusable React components
- `public/` - Static assets
- `tailwind.config.ts` - Tailwind CSS configuration
- `.eslintrc.json` - ESLint configuration

## Key Scripts
- `dev` - Run development server
- `build` - Build for production
- `start` - Start production server
- `lint` - Run ESLint checks

## Next Steps
1. Open `src/app/page.tsx` to start editing
2. Add your components in `src/components/`
3. Style your components using Tailwind CSS classes
4. Run `npm run dev` to see changes in real-time

For more information, visit [Next.js Documentation](https://nextjs.org/docs)
